basics.name: Pablo Valenzuela Cárcamo
basics.label: Software Engineer and AI & Tech Consultant freelance
basics.summary:
Founder, CTO, Project Manager, and Software Engineer with 14+ years of experience delivering product-led
platforms, rapid MVPs (2–8 weeks), and alignment with OKRs, benchmarks, and organizational budgets.

Extensive technical and executive experience leading projects, scaling agile teams, and managing portfolios (up to
8 projects) using Scrum/PMI methodology, and leading AI agent proofs of concept (RAG/ReAct). Interested in CTO,
Deputy Technology Manager, and Technology Project Manager roles.

work.name: Ecoinput - StartUp
work.summary:
● I developed a Proof of Concept (PoC) for a RAG Agent in one week using LangGraph and Hugging Face Inference. The agent responds without hallucinations, using Excel as a knowledge source.
● I implemented agentic patterns (ReAct) and optimized serverless inference to reduce the cost per token and accelerate time to market (TTM).
● I’m currently leading a PoC for automating requests and reminders via WhatsApp Business, evaluating trade-offs between LLMs and infrastructure.

work.name: Freelance Projects
work.summary:
● Truekazo (3 months): I developed back-end, push (FCM), serviced systemd for Rpush, p95 performance < 410ms, CI/CD, testing, TTM reduction ≈55%.
● BKL Trading Company (2 months): I developed a Shopify widget integrated with GraphQL that improved the online store's UX.
● BKL Trading Company (in progress): Developing a back-office web app to support the management of book imports and publications across various digital channels, with Shopify and Bsale integrations.

work.name: Quantus - Water Earth
work.summary:
● I developed an MVP SaaS and API in 8 weeks, implemented CI/CD and automated testing that reduced time to market (TTM) per feature by approximately 35%. 
● I designed background job architecture (Celery/Redis) and optimized performance, achieving p95 < 345ms / p99 < 0.6s, improving UX and SLAs.
● I advised on tech stack trade-offs and prepared TCO estimates to optimize budget and scalability.

work.name: EHAC Group S.A.
work.summary:
● I developed a custom ERP in 7 months and deployed it on GCP with Cloud Run and autoscaling; CI/CD pipelines reduced errors and costs by ~60%.
● I improved TTM by approximately 45% and performance (p95 ≈420ms, p99 ≈600ms) with background jobs and tuning, reducing maintenance SLAs from 4 to 1 hour.
● I led the on-premises to cloud migration consulting, including TCO estimations and operational risk mitigation.

work.name: Casablanca Transport S.A.
work.summary:
● I developed a CRM in 8 weeks that automated quote management and reduced request SLAs by approximately 65%, improving customer service and conversion rates.
● I managed backlogs and sprints with Product Owners (Scrum/PMI) and prepared an AWS quote and migration recommendation to optimize Total Cost of Ownership (TCO).

work.name: Ecoinput - StartUp
work.position: Founder, CTO, Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
work.summary:
● I founded and designed the startup's business model in 6 months.
● I launched the first MVP to production in 3 months, defining the backlog, tech stack, and roadmap. The MVP reduced customer service SLAs by approximately 45% and decreased operating costs.
● I built and led an agile team of 5 people in 2 months, implementing CI/CD and a delivery cadence aligned with OKRs.
● I negotiated and closed commercial partnerships (Klaviyo & Shopify Chile) that enabled integration channels and go-to-market strategies for e-commerce clients.

work.name: Ripley Bank
work.position: Project Manager in Innovation Management (Scrum Master)
work.summary:
● I built an agile team in 3 months and managed a portfolio of 8 concurrent projects (credit, insurance, back-office), applying PMI/Scrum to optimize CAPEX, aligned with the PO's OKRs, and mitigate risks.
● I designed the program roadmap and critical path, improving visibility for stakeholders and predictability of deliveries.

work.name: Tessi Group, France
work.summary:
● I built a team of 7 professionals in 2 months for core banking BPO (BBVA Colombia), reducing lead time by approximately 41% through coaching and process improvements.
● I implemented PMI governance and Scrum (WBS, SGSR) to align deliverables with the client's OKRs.

work.name: SBIF, now CMF
work.summary: ● I developed new components and pipeline automation (GitHub Actions) → Lead Time -50%; I managed 3 digital projects for the intranet.

work.name: DIPRES, Chile
work.summary: ● I developed and resolved bugs, features, and also testing for SIGFE, JEE, Oracle stored procedures for reporting modules, deliveries aligned with QA and government standards.

education.institution: Pontifical Catholic University of Chile (PUC Chile)

education.area: Digital Products and Innovation in IT

hard.name: Product & Delivery: Design Thinking, Lean Startup, MVP, BPM, TCO/TTM, SLA management.
Programming & Frameworks: Python, Java EE, JavaScript/TypeScript, Django, React, Spring Boot, Node.js.
Cloud & Infrastructure: GCP, AWS, FCM, DigitalOcean, CloudRun, Docker, Kubernetes, IaC.
AI/Data: ML/Deep Learning Fundamentals, LangGraph, Hugging Face, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Pandas, NumPy, RAG/React.
DevOps & Observability: CI/CD (GitHub Actions, CodeBuild, Jenkins), EKS, ECR, systemd, unit testing, coverage, p95/p99 monitoring.
Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis.
Tools & Management: Jira, Confluence, Slack, Git/GitHub.
Practices & Principles: SOLID, DDD, OOP, REST APIs, Web Vitals, Basic OWASP, KISS.

soft.name: Leadership & Management: Delta Model (MLD), Scrum, PMI, OKR-driven delivery, roadmap and portfolio management.
Personal Skills: Optimistic, proactive, strong analytical skills, self-motivated, collaborative, loyal, effective communicator, studious, and an avid reader.
Weaknesses: Over-focused on details, which could lead to delays and mild frustration when the outcome differs from the plan.

projects.name: Digital services quote advisor
projects.description: I developed for Ecoinput.com a virtual advisor that guides the prospect with a question-answer to choose the digital service that best suits their needs.

projects.name: Job English abbreviations
projects.description: Is a engine in Ruby that manager English words abbreviations and the save into a Hash.
highlights: More time to develop ideas and less time for bureaucracy
